title: Trading Spaces
description: Fandom: Harry PotterRelationships: Harry Potter/Draco Malfoy, Hermione Granger/Severus Snape--------------------------------------------------Dumbledore's scheme to create House Unity has great consequences. House Mascots, Traded Prefects -- Snippy, Snarky, Snakes, Shagging, Snogging are included! Enjoy, thee, thee, thee . . . Thank you and goodnight!
author: SnippyandSnarky
